price: They have no knowledge about it. They only follow conjecture, but conjecture is of no avail against the truth.
arabic: وَمَا لَهُم بِهِۦ مِنۡ عِلۡمٍۖ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّۖ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ شَيۡـٔٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā lahum bihi min ʿil'min in yattabiʿūna illā al-ẓana wa-inna al-ẓana lā yugh'nī mina al-ḥaqi shayan
